title: 59th IHGF Delhi Fair Spring 2025
description: India’s largest home & lifestyle sourcing exhibition.
fullDescription: Over 2,500 exhibitors will showcase home décor, textiles, furniture, and gifts. The fair attracts global buyers and designers seeking premium Indian craftsmanship.

title: Snapdragon Auto Day India 2025
description: Qualcomm showcase of connected-car platforms & ADAS.
fullDescription: Snapdragon Auto Day will explore innovations in connected vehicles, ADAS, and software-defined platforms. Top OEMs and suppliers will join for product demos and panels.

title: BSides Bangalore 2025
fullDescription: A grassroots tech conference with talks, hands-on workshops, and networking for security professionals. It brings together hackers, researchers, and IT teams.

title: Bengaluru Tech Summit 2025
description: Asia’s largest tech conclave on IT, IoT & smart cities.
fullDescription: A three-day summit with global tech leaders discussing AI, biotech, deep tech, and startups. Includes exhibition zones, keynote speeches, and hackathons.

title: IEEE ICCAD 2025
fullDescription: ICCAD explores advanced design and automation for electronics. Leading researchers will present papers and tutorials on system design and verification.

title: Conference on Insurance 2025
fullDescription: Global leaders will explore how microinsurance supports climate resilience and poverty reduction. Includes case studies, panels, and stakeholder roundtables.

title: World Aquatics Championships 2025
description: Top global competition for swimming, diving, and water polo.
fullDescription: More than 2,500 athletes from 210 countries will compete in 6 disciplines. Singapore hosts this major aquatics event for the first time.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025
description: Twentieth edition of premier global athletics competition.
fullDescription: Held in Tokyo’s National Stadium, this elite event features 49 track and field disciplines. Athletes from across the globe will battle for gold.
